document.full_text: exxon mobil said on wednesday it has restored all four of its japan group refineries to full operations and opened the shiogama terminal after the earthquake and tsunami severely damaged the terminal.
document.title: exxon restores japan refineries, terminal operations
lines_and_colors: exxon mobil said on wednesday it has restored all four of its japan group refineries to full operations and opened the shiogama terminal after the earthquake and tsunami severely damaged the terminal.
